attributes.action: Force the Daily Express to admit that Diana, Princess of Wales, is dead and there is no conspiracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Day in, day out we see the Express run a headline saying that the French are with-holding info on her death and that Prince Phillip was responsible.
This is utter rubbish and they should admit to the world and themselves that she is dead and no amount of complaining will bring her back....or make anyone buy their paper

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
